definition: snail/Taiwan pr. [gua1]/see 蝸牛|蜗牛[wo1 niu2]
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns
worm-gear pair/worm drive/worm and worm gear

sentences.english: The machine uses the worm-type supporting base with good rigidity and high precision.
sentences.chinese: 本机台采用蜗杆式支撑座，钢性好，精度高。

sentences.english: The slewing mechanism consists of hydraulic motor and worm speed reducer.
sentences.chinese: 回转机构由液压马达及蜗轮蜗杆减速器组成。

sentences.english: A new numerical computing method suitable for all kinds of cylindrical worm gearing is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的计算圆柱蜗杆副啮合的数值计算方法。

sentences.english: By means of the vector analytical method, all the results concerning this worm drive were deduced.
sentences.chinese: 用矢量解析法推导出了这种蜗杆传动的全部计算公式。

sentences.english: Precise in-built roller. Non - slipping. Easy to install.
sentences.chinese: 精密内置式的蜗杆蜗轮技术，不易打滑，装拆方便。

sentences.english: Assemble the screw yoke with the ballscrew.
sentences.chinese: 装配螺杆套和球形蜗杆。

sentences.english: This paper gives the theory and method of the controllable modification of ZC_1 worm drive.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了ZC_1蜗杆传动可控修形的理论和方法。

sentences.english: It also gives the calculation method for the torque of the worm and the power of the conveyor line.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了蜗杆扭矩及输送线功率的计算方法。

sentences.english: The paper put forward principle and object of straight profile circular plane worm's optimization design.
sentences.chinese: 根据提出的直廓环面蜗杆优化设计的原则和目标。

sentences.english: The curve equations of worm indexing earn mechanism with taper and spherical roofer have been listed.
sentences.chinese: 列出了锥形及球形滚子的蜗杆凸轮的曲面方程。

sentences.english: The proposed method is very valuable for the further study on the plane double enveloping hourglass worm pair.
sentences.chinese: 对于进一步分析滚锥包络环面蜗杆副传动非常有价值。

sentences.english: And when both displacement, the same worm compressor structure size is smaller.
sentences.chinese: 而当两者排气量相同时，则蜗杆压缩机结构尺寸较小。

definition: (of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
